name: redux-logger

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: LIBRARY_NAME=reduxLogger NODE_ENV=development $(npm bin)/webpack src/index.js dist/index.js --config webpack.build.js
scripts.build:umd:min: LIBRARY_NAME=reduxLogger NODE_ENV=production $(npm bin)/webpack -p src/index.js dist/index.min.js --config webpack.build.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run test:production && npm run build
scripts.spec: NODE_PATH=src nyc --all --silent --require babel-core/register mocha --plugins transform-inline-environment-variables --recursive spec/*.spec.js
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=development npm run lint && npm run spec
scripts.test:production: NODE_ENV=production npm run lint && npm run spec
